revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Patriot Memory |model=Gauntlet Node |revision=(PCGTW25S) |upc=0815530014003 |asin=B016YK9R3U |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Mapower Electronics |manuf_model=WiFi DAS |manuf_rev=(WI21) |fcc_date=06/07/2012 |fcc_id=LD3WIFIDAS21 |ic_id=10374A-PCGTW25S |type=mobile NAS,hard drive enclosure |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN25Q64-104HIP |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L512EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=SATA,USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=USB 3.0 to SATA Host Interface;Asmedia;ASM1053;;1;,,, CMOS 2K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Holtek;HT24LC02;;1;,,, Single-cell Li-Ion Charger IC w/ System Power Management;BCD Semiconductor;AUR9807;;1;,,, |flags=battery powered, |stock_boot=U-Boot |default_ssid=Patriot |default_ip=10.10.10.254 |oui=00:0A:D8, 00:02:72 }} '''Aero Wireless Mobile Drive''' (enclosure only) :[http://www.patriotmemory.com/product/indexp.jsp?source=0&prodgroupid=237&prodline=6&catid=43 Product page] :[http://www.mapower.com.tw/mapower/Product.asp?CateID=304&LineID=43 Product page for the ''WiFi DAS'' (WI21)]
*"EAW2-055-10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A label in the internal FCC photos shows the device with a 00:0A:D8 OUI. *It seems that this device is an enclosure to fit a 2.5" drive. :It would also seem that the HDD is connected to the Ralink SoC via :USB 2.0 and has a external USB 3.0 port to connect directly to the drive.
